messages.content: My dear fellow, dost thou recall the name of the great treasure sought by Thorin Oakenshield and his company, which lay beneath the lonely mountain, a prize coveted by both Dwarves and Elves alike?

quality_score.message: Excellent! Your wisdom rivals that of the White Council itself!
next_steps: Continue your journey through the deeper mysteries of Middle-earth.
Share your wisdom with others who seek to understand these ancient tales.

messages.content: My dear fellow, what is the name of the Shire-dwelling Hobbit who bears the One Ring on a perilous quest?

quality_score.message: Excellent! Your wisdom rivals that of the White Council itself!
next_steps: Continue your journey through the deeper mysteries of Middle-earth.

messages.content:
What is the color of the banner that the Elves of Lothlórien raised to signal their presence in Middle-earth?

1. Red
2. Blue
3. Green
4. White

quality_score.message: Even the wisest cannot see all ends. Let us explore this matter further.
quality_score.explanation: The lore of Middle-earth tells us that Blue.
next_steps: Consult the ancient texts for more knowledge on this subject.
Reflect on the connections between different realms of Middle-earth's lore.
Consider how this knowledge fits into the broader tapestry of Tolkien's world.
